descriptor.name: Grocery Flax Seeds
descriptor.long_desc: Our Organic Roasted Flaxseeds are a nutritional powerhouse as it is high in fibre and a rich source of plant-based omega-3 fatty acid, alpha-linolenic acid. Regular consumption of flaxseeds helps maintain your cholesterol levels. It decreases the risk of heart disease, obesity, diabetes, and metabolic syndrome.
